      • validateJwt

        public boolean validateJwt(java.lang.String jwt)
                    throws io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException
        Returns:
        true if JWT contains all the proprietary fields
        Throws:
        io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if JWT contains incorrect sign or any other fatal problems. Particularly throws ExpiredJwtException if the JWT is expired.
